value.title: Create a new Node.js project and work with dependencies
value.excerpt: Create a Node.js project and learn to add packages and manage package dependencies in your project.

value.title: Explain machine learning models with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Many decisions made by organizations and automated systems today are based on predictions made by machine learning models. It's increasingly important to be able to understand the factors that influence the predictions models make.

images.title: Explain machine learning models with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Make your application storage highly available with read-access geo-redundant storage
value.excerpt: In this module, you learn how to make your application storage highly available by ensuring that you can fail over resources if there's an Azure region failure.

images.title: Make your application storage highly available with read-access geo-redundant storage

value.title: Host your own build agent in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Learn how to use your own build agent when Microsoft-hosted agents don't meet your needs.

images.title: Host your own build agent in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS
value.excerpt: Create a DNS zone for your domain name. Create DNS records to map the URL to an IP address. Test that the domain name resolves to your web server.

images.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS

value.title: Identify security threats with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: In this module, youâ€™ll discover how to detect and respond to threats with Azure Security Center.

images.title: Identify security threats with Azure Security Center

value.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

images.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning
Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Introduction to Node.js
value.excerpt: Learn everything about Node.js: what it is, how does it work and when to use it.

value.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Explore how Azure Stream Analytics integrates with your applications or Internet of Things (IoT) devices to gain insights with real-time streaming data. Learn how to consume and analyze data streams and derive actionable results.

images.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics

value.title: Keep your virtual machines updated
value.excerpt: Deploy the Azure Update Management solution to update virtual machines in your cloud environment.

images.title: Keep your virtual machines updated

value.title: Simplify access and identity provisioning with Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Microsoft 365 authentication tools for access and identity provisioning.

images.title: Simplify access and identity provisioning with Microsoft 365

value.title: Secure administrator accounts in Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Learn about securing administrator accounts through secure devices, dedicated administrator accounts, and just-in-time privileges.

value.title: Manage Agile software delivery plans across teams
value.excerpt: Learn to optimize delivery efficiency by improving work plan visibility across teams.

value.title: Migrate your repository by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn to move your existing project to GitHub from a legacy version control system.

images.title: Migrate your repository by using GitHub best practices

value.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage
value.excerpt: Discover the tools available to detect and correct problems with your Azure Storage to enable your cloud storage infrastructure to operate at peak performance.

images.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage

value.title: Monitor GitHub events by using a webhook with Azure Functions
value.excerpt: Webhooks offer a lightweight mechanism for your app to be notified by another service when something of interest happens. In this module. you'll learn how to trigger an Azure function with a GitHub webhook and parse the payload for insights.

images.title: Monitor GitHub events by using a webhook with Azure Functions

value.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
value.excerpt: Use neural network models to make predictions. Change neural network structures to refine predictions using TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks

value.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
value.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

images.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup

value.title: Create your first Q# program by using the Quantum Development Kit
value.excerpt: Get started with Q# programming by building a quantum random number generator.

images.title: Create your first Q# program by using the Quantum Development Kit

value.title: SAP HANA on Azure Compute, Network, and Storage
value.excerpt: SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) provides virtual machines for deploying and running SAP HANA. This module explores the SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) solution that builds on assigned, non-shared host/server bare-metal hardware.

images.title: SAP HANA on Azure Compute, Network, and Storage

value.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
value.excerpt: Use Azure Disk Encryption (ADE) to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new VMs.

images.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks

value.title: Using IAAS support with Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: There are many SAP-certified operating systems supported by SAP running on Azure VMs. In this module, you will review the SAP recommended support products for VM types and the network, database, and monitoring requirements.

images.title: Using IAAS support with Azure for SAP workloads

value.title: Introduction to machine learning with Python and Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Python has become a dominant language for doing data analysis with machine learning. Learn how to leverage Python and associated libraries in Jupyter Notebooks run on Azure Notebooks to predict patterns and identify trends.

topItems.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
topItems.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

topItems.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python
topItems.excerpt: Import airline arrival data into a Jupyter notebook and use Pandas to clean it. Then, build a machine learning model with Scikit-Learn and use Matplotlib to visualize output.

images.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python

topItems.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
topItems.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Process and classify images with the Azure Cognitive Vision Services
value.excerpt: Microsoft Cognitive Services offers pre-built functionality to enable computer vision functionality in your applications.  Learn how to use the Cognitive Vision Services to detect faces, tag and classify images, and identify objects.

topItems.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Computer Vision API in Azure that allows you to identify facial details in pictures.

images.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

topItems.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

images.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service

topItems.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
topItems.excerpt: Create, train and test a custom image classification model using the Custom Vision Service to accurately identify paintings from famous artists.

images.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing
value.excerpt: In manufacturing, decision-makers must take into account specific industry considerations before they can realize the true transformational power of AI in the enterprise. To create real business value, a comprehensive understanding of all the strategic components is required.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing

value.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management
value.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month. Use this understanding to create an Azure budget to monitor and alert on your costs.

images.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management

value.title: Applications and infrastructure migration and modernization
value.excerpt: Every modern business is powered by applications, such as internal procurement applications, Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems, retail websites, and third-party products. As your business prepares for digital transformation, itâ€™s important to begin modernizing and migrating your applications and infrastructure to the cloud. Azure is a key component of that process. You can choose to migrate, modernize, or build cloud native solutions depending on your business goals and how you assess your application portfolio. This is a strategic decision. Youâ€™ll be able to choose the path thatâ€™s right for your organization.

images.title: Applications and infrastructure migration and modernization

value.title: Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning to find the best model for your data.

images.title: Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning
Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
